text: Hey guys, it’s Ro!

I wanted to make a quick video because I have
been getting a lot of requests from you

guys to make merch, and I’ve never designed
merch before and I wanted to wait
for the perfect time…
Hwah-hah-hah-hah-hah-hah-hah!
I’m being corny!

So in celebration of the song Perfect Together
coming out I decided to design
a really cute t-shirt. Dew!

So it’s really special because it’s my
first t-shirt and it has one of my
my favorite lyrics from the song.

So we’ve got the little apple pie and the
little ice cream.

Because what’s the point of apple pie, without
the ice cream on the side?
There is no point!

These shirts are available online at represent,
I’ll put a link down below,

They are available only for a limited time,
theres 7 more days left, there is a

countdown. So this is just a limited time,
my first shirt.

Also, we are going to have the same design
on every shirt, but you can

choose the style, we have a t-shirt, we have
a 3/4 length shirt,

which look like a baseball T, I’m ordering
one in black.

Then we have a sweatshirt, which my sister
is ordering in grey, and then we

have a hoodie. And there are adult sizes and
kid sizes.

And if you’re like me and you teeter between
the two, adult and youth sizes,

I’m wearing a youth shirt right now so….
No shame in my game!

Also, what I like is that they come in different
colors so you can customize
and pick your favorites.

Just a reminder I picked the really high quality
shirts so it is 100% cotton,

and it’s just something good to keep in
mind when you’re ordering,
it may shrink a little.

So again, I will be putting a link down below,
there are 7 days left to order this

limited time shirt, and at the end of the
7 days represent will mail you your shirt.

Also, another announcement about the song
Perfect Together, it is now available on

iTunes, Google Play and Amazon, so I’ll
put the links down below,
so you can check ‘em out.

While I was brainstorming and designing the
shirt, I came up with a bunch

of different characters that are not on the
shirt but I just wanted to show

you guys some of my weird little things that
I came up with.

So we have the 1 on the shirt, apple pie and
ice cream, and then we have

marshmallow and graham cracker, popcorn and
movies, this is one of my

favorites, because this is like my favorite
night ever. Little waffle fry
and slider and eggs and bacon.

These are just cute little character designs
from the lyrics in the song,

I’m not sure what I’m gonna do with these
yet, but… Just what I’m messing around with.

Another announcement is… I hired a composer,
because I wanted to do something

special for you guys, just to say thank you
for being so supportive.
And, we’ve got sheet music to perfect together!
Oh this is upside down!

Ta-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha! It would be wouldn’t
it!?!?

The sheet music also has the guitar cords,
so whether you’re learning to play
on the piano or the guitar, you’ve got both!

I’ll put a link down below so you can download
it if you’d like and it is

totally free, it is my gift to you, and I
hope you enjoy it!

Lastly, I have been getting a lot of requests
from you guys to make a

DIY treats video, with the little food pairings
from perfect together, and I thought
that is a really fun idea!

So, let me know in the comments down below
what treats you would like to see

me make, and, I’m gonna try to do that for
you this weekend!

And, just a reminder, before this video is
done, I’ll put all the links

down below to everything I talked about, and
you have 7 days to order a t-shirt
if you would like!
OK, thanks again you guys.
Bye-bye!
Meep-meep-ma-meep-meep!
